attributes.action: Stop all Bank Bonuses and Jollies whilst we the savers and investors are losing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the investors and savers are losing a lot of interest on which we rely because of the shabby and irresponsible behaviour of Bankers.  We ask that it be made illegal for them to receive bonuses in the same way as we cannot receive dividends from the Banks until the Banks have cleared their debts to the taxpayer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
